trans-unit.source: Represents an extensibility element added to an <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"></xref> within an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 代表擴充性項目加入至<xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"> </xref> XML Web 服務中。

trans-unit.source: This class respresents an extensibility element in Web Services Description Language (WSDL) specific to HTTP.
trans-unit.target: 此類別代表的擴充性項目中 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 的特定 HTTP。

trans-unit.source: It specifies the relative URL of an operation using as the base the location specified by an <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.HttpAddressBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 它會指定使用做為基底<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.HttpAddressBinding>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.HttpAddressBinding>所指定的位置的作業的相對 URL

trans-unit.source: For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關指定的 XML Web 服務通訊協定的詳細資訊，請參閱[[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices >]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: 如需 WSDL 的詳細資訊，請參閱在 http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/ 規格。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.HttpOperationBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.HttpOperationBinding"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL relative to the location specified by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.HttpAddressBinding"></xref>, within the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document, of the operation supported by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.HttpOperationBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定相對於所指定位置的 URL <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.HttpAddressBinding"> </xref>、 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 內文件中，作業的支援<xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.HttpOperationBinding"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An unencoded string representing the relative path.
trans-unit.target: 未編碼的字串，表示相對路徑。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
